allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1 Complete: Implement Sanity CMS foundation

Added complete CMS infrastructure:

CMS Schema Models (8 content types):
- Portfolio Projects with full technical specs
- Gallery Images with size variants
- Client Testimonials with ratings
- Process Timeline Steps
- Services offerings
- Statistics/Metrics
- Founder bio and info
- Site-wide Settings

Infrastructure:
- Sanity client configuration
- Image URL builder with optimization
- TypeScript interfaces for type safety
- GROQ query functions for all content types
- Studio route at /studio for content management

Documentation:
- Comprehensive CMS setup guide
- Environment variable templates
- Usage instructions and troubleshooting

Dependencies:
- @sanity/client, @sanity/image-url, next-sanity
- sanity, @sanity/vision

Next: Phase 2 - Migrate existing content to CMS

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(pnpm add ai @ai-sdk/openai langchain @langchain/community @upstash/redis @upstash/ratelimit @sentry/nextjs swr recharts date-fns sharp @vercel/og next-pwa workbox-webpack-plugin commander inquirer chalk zod-to-json-schema)
Bash(pnpm add -D vitest @vitest/ui @vitest/coverage-v8 @testing-library/react @testing-library/jest-dom @playwright/test @lhci/cli prettier husky lint-staged @vitejs/plugin-react jsdom @types/three)
Bash(pnpm add resend react-email @react-email/components @vercel/blob contentlayer next-contentlayer zod)
